tree.name: Jamir Watkins
tree.note: #43 overall pick from Florida State. Two-way contract. WAS acquired this pick by trading #18 to UTA for #21, #43, and future 2nds.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 1st Round Pick (#18)
assetsGivenUp.note: Originally Memphis's pick, acquired by WAS Feb 2025. Same pick also used to draft Will Riley (#21).
